name: Slug Bounce
description:
Slug Bounce - A slammin' platformer!

In a strange checkered land lies a little blue slug. Help him complete 15 levels to find the legendary cheeseburger he briefly thought about one time!

Instructions
  • Use the left and right arrow keys to move, and the spacebar to jump.
  • Collecting a Slam Bean will add it to your slam counter.
  • If you have at least one Slam Bean, press the spacebar in mid-air to perform a Slug Slam!
  • Press R to quickly restart a level.
  • Press P to pause/unpause the game.
  • Press M to mute/unmute the music.
Credits
  • Game programmed in Unity by ThePowerPlayer
  • Majority of graphics drawn by ThePowerPlayer
  • Original song "Slug Bounce Theme" composed by ThePowerPlayer
Graphics
  • Restart symbol: https://www.freeiconspng.com/img/32264
Sound Effects
  • Jump sound effect: https://freesound.org/people/ArrowheadProductions/sounds/566685/
  • Slam sound effect: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=D9AxvFHq9yU
  • Death sound effect: https://freesound.org/people/unfa/sounds/245645/
  • Spring sound effect: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TLqL_68JPec
  • Switch sound effect from Super Mario World (1990) by Nintendo
  • Burger-eating sound effect from Minecraft (2011) by Mojang
  • All other sounds generated using ChipTone (https://sfbgames.itch.io/chiptone)
